question_text: Which of the following are valid consequences of incorrectly routed or loose antenna wires in a laptop? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Complete lack of wireless signal detection
Physical damage to antenna connectors on the card
Short circuit in the display power rails
correct_answer: Complete lack of wireless signal detection
Physical damage to antenna connectors on the card
explanation: Signal issues and hardware damage can occur if antennas are loose, misrouted, or forced during reassembly. Display power rails are unrelated.
